title: Morning Joe 3/22/21
description: Michael R. Sherwin, the federal prosecutor who was heading the Justice Department’s investigation into the January 6 riot, says 'evidence is trending' toward charges of sedition for some participants. The Morning Joe panel discusses.
author: news.podcasts@nbcuni.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Michael R. Sherwin, the federal prosecutor who was heading the Justice Department’s investigation into the January 6 riot, says 'evidence is trending' toward charges of sedition for some participants. The Morning Joe panel discusses.
